name: Fish Chowder Casserole
ingredients: 2 pounds fish, cooked and broken into bite-size pieces
16 ounces frozen cauliflower, cooked and well-drained
6 green onions, white and green parts, chopped (about 1 1/2 ounces chopped)

instructions.en: Combine the cream cheese, garlic, pepper, dill, chives and parsley in a 2-quart casserole; blend well.
Stir in the fish and cauliflower and mix until well-coated with the cream cheese mixture.
Fold in the cheddar cheese and green onions then add some salt, if needed.
Bake at 350Â°F for about 30-35 minutes or until hot and bubbly and browned on the top.

notes: The 2 pounds of fish is the uncooked weight and will yield just over 1 pound of cooked fish. Adjust salt to taste as needed.
